item.title: Fuseproject's Three-Port Zolt Charger
item.description:
Fuseproject's Three-Port Zolt Charger

Launching today, the Zolt Laptop Charger aims to make powering all your devices faster, easier and much less cumbersome. The charger-designed by fuseproject -is a sleek, lightweight device with three USB ports. This translates to charging three devices (laptop, phone, smartwatch, portable phone-charger, you name it) all at once-while only using one power outlet.

item.title: New SpaceX landing photos make you feel like the rocket is coming down on top of you
item.description:
New SpaceX landing photos make you feel like the rocket is coming down on top of you

Up until now, we've really only seen SpaceX's rocket landing in the middle of the ocean from afar. Chase planes near the drone ship provided a spectacular view of the milestone event, but now, S...

item.title: The Impossible Project's first instant camera has an app with full manual controls
item.description:
The Impossible Project's first instant camera has an app with full manual controls

The Impossible Project is best known for keeping Polaroid's type 600 instant film format alive even after it was abandoned by the long-time camera maker in 2008. The company also refurbishes old Polaroid type 600 cameras in order to resell them.
